title: How to Evolve Feebas in Pokémon Emerald

steps.title: Beat the Elite Four
steps.content: Beat the Elite Four . This is only mandatory if you plan to get berries by talking to the Berry Master's wife. Beating them will put the word "Contest" in your vocabulary.

steps.title: Have a Feebas on your team of Pokémon.
steps.content: Have a Feebas on your team of Pokémon. If you don't have one, then either catch or trade one.

steps.title: Get lots of Pamtre berries.
steps.content: Get lots of Pamtre berries. One way to get some is to go to the Berry Master's house on route 123 and talking to the Berry Master's wife. [1] X Research source She'll ask you to tell her a phrase. Tell her "Challenge Contest", and she'll give you a Pamtre berry. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Plant the berry over and over again until you have about 5 berries.
steps.content: Plant the berry over and over again until you have about 5 berries. This will take about 3 days for all of them to grow.

steps.title: Go to the Berry Blend and blend them into Pokéblocks.
steps.content: Go to the Berry Blend and blend them into Pokéblocks. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Feed all the Pokéblocks to your Feebas, or until its beauty is maxed out (level 170).
steps.content: Feed all the Pokéblocks to your Feebas, or until its beauty is maxed out (level 170). [4] X Research source

steps.title: Level up your Feebas by 1 level, with either a Rare Candy or through exp.
steps.content: Level up your Feebas by 1 level, with either a Rare Candy or through exp. points. [5] X Research source
